body:
Hi guys, im back o.o
I havent released a resource pack in a while... So i just made one.. Not too much edited but you know.. Pretty decent i guess.

And also I cant add motion blur to my videos because i constantly run out of memory? With a 2TB hardrive? ._. (Portable hardrive). So thats that

Before i forget as well.. I recommend if you havent so already to subscribe to my youtube channel.. I will probably will be posting daily videos and i just dont want to spam the forums with every single one of my videos... So here is the pack (Download in the description):

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L54zNXlN1hw&feature=youtu.be
Enyoy! ^.^
